name: bizflow-platform
description: AI-powered business management platform for small businesses

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:web
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:api -- --coverage && npm run test:web -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:web
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run deploy:staging:api && npm run deploy:staging:web
scripts.deploy:production: npm run build && npm run deploy:production:api && npm run deploy:production:web
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api && npm install && cd ../web-app && npm install

author: BizFlow Team
